permissions: Admin users can update developer references. Non-admin users can update a developer reference only if they are authorized to update the referenced subject (subject policy update? must allow).
validation_notes: At least one of --value or the pair --subject-type/--subject-id must be provided; otherwise the CLI returns an error. --subject-type must be used with --subject-id (and vice versa). Server validations require value to be present if set, subject type to be valid for the developer reference type, and subject broker to match the developer reference type broker.

flags.name: --value
flags.validation: Example: EXT-67890. Server requires value to be present.

flags.name: --subject-type
flags.validation: Must be used with --subject-id. Example: customers.
